    public class SelectSort {

int[] arr = {1,2,4,2,0,7,3,3};
public int[] bubbleSort(){

for(int j = i; j < arr.length; j++){
//å°±åªæ˜¯è¿™é‡Œçš„å¾ªç¯æ¡ä»¶ä¸åŒè€Œå·²ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­æ¡ä»¶ä¹Ÿä¸ç›¸åŒ
if(arr[j] < arr[i]){

}
}
}

}

public void swap(int[] nums, int index1,int index2){
nums[index1] = nums[index1] ^ nums[index2];
nums[index2] = nums[index1] ^ nums[index2];
nums[index1] = nums[index2] ^ nums[index1];
}
public static void main(String[] args) {

package com.cxy.SortingAlgorithm;

/**

    public class BubbleSort {

int[] arr = {1,2,4,2,0,7,3,3};
public int[] bubbleSort(){
for(int i = 0 ; i<arr.length-1 ;i++){
for(int j = 0; j < arr.length-1; j++){
if(arr[j] > arr[j+1]){
swap(arr,j,j+1);
}
}
}
return arr;
}

public void swap(int[] nums, int index1,int index2){
nums[index1] = nums[index1] ^ nums[index2];
nums[index2] = nums[index1] ^ nums[index2];
nums[index1] = nums[index2] ^ nums[index1];
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
BubbleSort sort = new BubbleSort();
int[] newarr = {1,2,3};
int[] bubbleSort = sort.bubbleSort();
for (int i : bubbleSort) {
System.out.println(i);
}
}
}

package com.cxy.config;import org.apache.shiro.spring.web.ShiroFilterFactoryBean;import org.apache.shiro.web.mgt.DefaultWebSecurityManager;import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Qualifier;import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean;import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration;import java.util.LinkedHashMap;import java.util.Map;@Configurationpublic class ShiroConfig {  //ä¸»è¦æœ‰ä¸‰å¤§å¯¹è±¡éœ€è¦æ•´åˆè¿›æ¥  //1.shiroFilterFactoryBean  //2.DefaultWebSecurityManager  @Bean  public ShiroFilterFactoryBean getShiroFilterFactoryBean(@Qualifier("getDefaultWebSecurityManager") DefaultWebSecurityManager defaultWebSecurityManager){    //è®¾ç½®å®‰å…¨ç®¡ç†å™¨    ShiroFilterFactoryBean bean = new ShiroFilterFactoryBean();    bean.setSecurityManager(defaultWebSecurityManager);    /**     * æ·»åŠ shiroçš„å†…ç½®è¿‡æ»¤å™¨     *     *///    anoo: æ— éœ€è®¤è¯å°±å¯ä»¥è®¿é—®ï¼Œ//    authc: è®¤è¯äº†æ‰èƒ½è¿›è¡Œè®¿é—®//    userï¼š å¿…é¡»æ‹¥æœ‰è®°ä½æˆ‘åŠŸèƒ½æ‰èƒ½ç”¨//    Parmï¼š æ‹¥æœ‰æŸä¸ªèµ„æºçš„æƒé™æ‰èƒ½è¿›è¡Œè®¿é—®//    role: æ‹¥æœ‰æŸä¸ªæƒé™æ‰èƒ½è®¿é—®    Map<String, String> map = new LinkedHashMap<>();//    1.éœ€è¦æˆæƒæ‰èƒ½è®¿é—®//    map.put("/toIndex","authc");//    map.put("/toCatagroy","authc");//    2.æ— é¡»æˆæƒå°±å¯ä»¥è®¿é—®    map.put("/toIndex", "authc");    //3.æ‹¦æˆªé¡µé¢    bean.setFilterChainDefinitionMap(map);    bean.setLoginUrl("/toLogin");    return bean;  }  @Bean  public DefaultWebSecurityManager getDefaultWebSecurityManager(@Qualifier("userRealm") UserRealm realm){    DefaultWebSecurityManager manager = new DefaultWebSecurityManager();    //å…³è”userRealm    manager.setRealm(realm);    return manager;  }  //3.åˆ›å»ºrealmå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œéœ€è¦è‡ªå®šä¹‰ç±»  @Bean  public UserRealm userRealm(){    return new UserRealm();  }}/***è¿™ä¸ªæ˜¯ä»ä¸‹å¾€ä¸Šè¿›è¡Œé…ç½®çš„ï¼Œä¸»è¦æœ‰è¿™å‡ ä¸ªä¸»è¦çš„å¯¹è±¡1.realmå¯¹è±¡2.DefaultWebSecurityManager3.ShiroFilterFactoryBean*/

package com.cxy.config;import org.springframework.security.config.annotation.authentication.builders.AuthenticationManagerBuilder;import org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.builders.HttpSecurity;import org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.configuration.EnableWebSecurity;import org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.configuration.WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter;import org.springframework.security.crypto.bcrypt.BCryptPasswordEncoder;@EnableWebSecuritypublic class SecurityConfig extends WebSecurityConfigurerAdapter {//  æˆæƒ è¿™é‡Œæ˜¯é“¾å¼ç¼–ç¨‹ï¼Œè·Ÿå‰ç«¯ä¸­çš„promiseå‡½æ•°æœ‰ç‚¹ç›¸åƒ  @Override  protected void configure(HttpSecurity http) throws Exception {    //é¦–é¡µæ‰€æœ‰äººå¯ä»¥è®¿é—®ï¼ŒåŠŸèƒ½é¡µå…·æœ‰æƒé™çš„æ‰èƒ½è¿›è¡Œè®¿é—®    http.authorizeRequests().antMatchers("/")            .permitAll()            .antMatchers("/level1/**").hasRole("vip1")            .antMatchers("/level2/**").hasRole("vip2")            .antMatchers("/level3/**").hasRole("vip3");    //å¼€å¯æ³¨é”€åŠŸèƒ½    http.logout().logoutSuccessUrl("/");    //å¼€å¯è®°ä½æˆ‘åŠŸèƒ½    http.rememberMe().rememberMeParameter("remember");  }//  è®¤è¯//  è¦è¿›è¡Œå¯†ç è¿›è¡ŒåŠ å¯†//  ä½¿ç”¨spring securityä¸­çš„passwordç¼–ç æ ¼å¼  @Override  protected void configure(AuthenticationManagerBuilder auth) throws Exception {    //è¿™é‡Œåº”è¯¥æ˜¯ä»æ•°æ®åº“ä¸­æŸ¥æ‰¾æ•°æ®    auth.inMemoryAuthentication().passwordEncoder(new BCryptPasswordEncoder())            .withUser("cxy").password(new BCryptPasswordEncoder().encode("123456")).roles("vip1","vip2")    .and()    .withUser("root").password(new BCryptPasswordEncoder().encode("123456")).roles("vip1","vip2","vip3")    .and()    .withUser("chest").password(new BCryptPasswordEncoder().encode("123456")).roles("vip1");  }}

entry.content:
åˆå¹¶æ’åºæ•°ç»„

é¢˜ç›®è¦æ±‚ï¼š

  • Input:
    • A = [1,2,3,0,0,0], m = 3
    • B = [2,5,6], n = 3
    • Output: [1,2,2,3,5,6]

å‡½æ•°çš„å‚æ•°å¦‚ä¸‹

//è¾“å…¥å‚æ•°ä¸ºä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°ç»„åŠ ä¸Šä¸¤æ•°ç»„çš„åˆ†åˆ«é•¿åº¦ï¼Œè€Œä¸”Aæ•°ç»„æ˜¯å®Œå…¨å¯ä»¥è£…ä¸‹Bçš„public void merge(int[] A, int m, int[] B, int n) {}

è§£é¢˜æ€è·¯ä¸€

å¯ä»¥å…ˆå°†ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªæ•°ç»„åŠ å…¥åˆ°ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„çš„æœ«å°¾ï¼Œç„¶åå¯¹æ•´ä¸ªæ•°ç»„Aè¿›è¡Œå†’æ³¡æ’åºå‡åºæ’åˆ—ã€‚

//æ ¸å¿ƒä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹package com.cxy.SortingAlgorithm;/** *You are given two sorted arrays, A and B, where A has a large enough buffer at the end to hold B. Write a method to merge B into A in sorted order. * * Initially the number of elements in A and B are m and n respectively. * * Example: * * Input: * A = [1,2,3,0,0,0], m = 3 * B = [2,5,6],       n = 3 * * Output: [1,2,2,3,5,6] * * æ¥æºï¼šåŠ›æ‰£ï¼ˆLeetCodeï¼‰ * é“¾æ¥ï¼šhttps://leetcode-cn.com/problems/sorted-merge-lcci * è‘—ä½œæƒå½’é¢†æ‰£ç½‘ç»œæ‰€æœ‰ã€‚å•†ä¸šè½¬è½½è¯·è”ç³»å®˜æ–¹æˆæƒï¼Œéå•†ä¸šè½¬è½½è¯·æ³¨æ˜å‡ºå¤„ã€‚ */public class MergeSortArray {  /**   * æ€è·¯å°±æ˜¯å…ˆå°†Bä¸­åé¢çš„æ•°æ®å­˜åˆ°Aä¸­ï¼Œç„¶åå†è¿›è¡Œæ’åº   */  //å°†ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°ç»„è¿›è¡Œåˆå¹¶ç„¶åè¿”å›  private int[] sumArr(int[] A, int m,int[] B,int n){    if(m == 0 && n == 0){return A;}    if(m == 0){return B;}    if(n == 0){return A;}    int index = m;    int j = 0;    for(; index <= m+n-1; index++){      A[index] = B[j];//      System.out.println(A[n]);      j++;    }    return A;  }  public void merge(int[] A, int m, int[] B, int n) {    //jæ˜¯æŒ‡å‘çš„Bä¸­çš„ä¸‹æ ‡    int[] sumArr = sumArr(A,m, B,n);    //å¯¹æ•°æ®è¿›è¡Œæ’åº,é‡‡ç”¨å†’æ³¡æ’åºè¿›è¡Œé™åºæ’åˆ—    for(int i = 0;i<sumArr.length-1;i++){      for(int j = i+1; j<sumArr.length-1; j++){        System.out.println(sumArr[i] +" -- "+ sumArr[j]);        if(sumArr[i] > sumArr[j]){          int temp = sumArr[i];          sumArr[i] = sumArr[j];          sumArr[j] = temp;        }      }    }  }  public static void main(String[] args) {    int[] A = new int[] {0};    int[] B = new int[] {2};    new MergeSortArray().merge(A, 0,B, 1);  }}

è§£é¢˜æ€è·¯äºŒ

  • å› ä¸ºä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°ç»„éƒ½æ˜¯æ’å¥½åºçš„ï¼ŒåŒæŒ‡é’ˆéƒ½æŒ‡å‘æ•°ç»„çš„å¤´çš„è¯ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡ æ¯”è¾ƒéƒ½è¦ç§»åŠ¨æ•°ç»„çš„åé¢å…¨éƒ¨ï¼Œæ¢ä¸€ç§æ€è·¯ï¼Œä»åé¢è¿›è¡ŒæŒ‡å‘ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡æ¯”è¾ƒå°¾éƒ¨çš„ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°æ®å¤§å° ï¼Œå¤§çš„å°±æ”¾å…¥Açš„å°¾éƒ¨ï¼Œä¾æ¬¡è¿™æ ·å¾ªç¯ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œè¦æ³¨æ„å½“Aæ•°ç»„ä¸ºç©ºçš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œç›´æ¥å°†Bçš„æ•°æ®å…¨éƒ¨æ¬åˆ°Aé‡Œé¢å°±å¯ä»¥äº†ã€‚
    class Solution {public void merge(int[] A, int m, int[] B, int n) {  //ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°ç»„ä¸­çš„ä¸‹æ ‡  int i = m - 1;  int j = n - 1;  //æ–°çš„åˆå¹¶çš„æ•°ç»„  int index = m + n-1;  while(j >= 0){    //å¦‚æœæ•°ç»„Aä¸ºç©ºï¼Œç›´æ¥å°†æ•°ç»„Bä¸­çš„å†…å®¹åŠ åˆ°    if(i < 0 || A[i] < B[j]){      A[index] = B[j];      j--;    }else{      A[index] = A[i];      i--;    }    index--;  }}}
    è¿™é‡Œçš„åŒæŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘çš„åˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯æ•°ç»„çš„å°¾éƒ¨ï¼Œç„¶åä¾æ¬¡æ¯”è¾ƒå¤§å°ï¼Œç‰¹åˆ«è¦æ³¨æ„çš„æ˜¯Aå¯èƒ½æ˜¯ä¸ºç©ºçš„ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯æ²¡æœ‰å‰é¢çš„å…ƒæ•°æ®ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ç›´æ¥åœ¨whileé‡Œé¢ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡åˆ¤æ–­ç›´æ¥å°†BåŠ å…¥åˆ°Aä¸­ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªæ˜¯è¿™é“é¢˜çš„é‡è¦çš„ä¸€ç‚¹ã€‚

Given a binary tree, find its maximum depth.

The maximum depth is the number of nodes along the longest path from the root node down to the farthest leaf node.

Note: A leaf is a node with no children.

Example:

Given binary tree [3,9,20,null,null,15,7],

3

/
9 20
/
15 7
return its depth = 3.

ç»™ä¸€ä¸ªäºŒå‰æ ‘ï¼Œå°†ä»–çš„æœ€å¤§æ·±æ±‚å‡ºæ¥å¹¶ä¸”è¿›è¡Œè¾“å‡º
1.é‡‡ç”¨é€’å½’çš„æ€æƒ³ï¼Œåœæ­¢é€’å½’çš„æ¡ä»¶æ˜¯æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹æ²¡æœ‰å·¦å­æ ‘å¹¶ä¸”æ²¡æœ‰å³å­æ ‘ï¼Œå°±è¿”å›0ï¼Œ
2.é€’å½’åšä»€ä¹ˆäº‹æƒ…ï¼Œé€’å½’å·¦å­æ ‘ï¼Œé€’å½’å³å­æ ‘ï¼Œæ‰¾åˆ°ä¸¤ä¸ªå­æ ‘æ·±åº¦æœ€å¤§å€¼ï¼Œå†è¿›è¡ŒåŠ 3.è¿”å›çš„å°±æ˜¯ä¸¤ä¸ªå­æ ‘æ·±åº¦æœ€å¤§å€¼åŠ 1

package com.cxy.recursive;import com.cxy.linkedtable.TreeNode;import java.util.List;/** * äºŒå‰æ ‘çš„æ·±åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆæœç´¢é€’å½’å®ç° */public class BinaryTreeDepth {  public int maxDepth(TreeNode root) {    if(root == null){return 0;}    int leftDeep = maxDepth(root.left);    int rightDeep = maxDepth(root.right);    return Math.max(leftDeep, rightDeep)+1;  }  public static void main(String[] args){    TreeNode left = new TreeNode(1, null, null);    TreeNode right = new TreeNode(2, null, null);    TreeNode root = new TreeNode(0, left, right);    int depth = new BinaryTreeDepth().maxDepth(root);    System.out.println(depth);  }}

 //ç”¨äºå­˜å‚¨çš„é›†åˆ  List<String> res = new ArrayList<>();  public List<String> generateParenthesis(int n) {    helper(n, n, "");    return res;  }  private void helper(int left , int right , String curStr){    if(left == 0 && right == 0 ) {      res.add(curStr);      return;    }    //1.ç»“æŸæ¡ä»¶ï¼Œå³æ²¡æœ‰å·¦æ‹¬å·ï¼Œä¹Ÿæ²¡æœ‰å³æ‹¬å·ï¼Œå°±è¿”å›ï¼Œå¹¶å°†ç»“æœåŠ å…¥res    //2.å‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨,è¿˜æœ‰å·¦æ‹¬å·ï¼Œå°±æ·»åŠ å·¦æ‹¬å·    if(left > 0) {      helper( left - 1, right, curStr + "(" );    }    if(right > left) {      helper(left, right - 1, curStr + ")" );    }  }

entry.title: ç®—æ³•18(é€’å½’)-æ–æ³¢æ‹‰å¥‘æ•°åˆ—
entry.content:
é¢˜ç›®ï¼š
The Fibonacci numbers, commonly denoted F(n) form a sequence, called the Fibonacci sequence, such that each number is the sum of the two preceding ones, starting from 0 and 1. That is,

F(0) = 0, F(1) = 1
F(N) = F(N - 1) + F(N - 2), for N > 1.
Given N, calculate F(N).

Example 1:

Input: 2
Output: 1
Explanation: F(2) = F(1) + F(0) = 1 + 0 = 1.
Example 2:

Input: 3
Output: 2
Explanation: F(3) = F(2) + F(1) = 1 + 1 = 2.
Example 3:

Input: 4
Output: 3
Explanation: F(4) = F(3) + F(2) = 2 + 1 = 3.

Note:

0 â‰¤ N â‰¤ 30.

é‡‡ç”¨é€’å½’çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œç§’è§£è¿™é“é¢˜ï¼šä»£ç ä¸­ä¹Ÿæœ‰è¯¦ç»†çš„æè¿°

public class FibonacciSequence {  //1.å‡½æ•°æ˜¯ç”¨æ¥å¹²ä»€ä¹ˆçš„ï¼šè®¡ç®—f(N)  //2.å‡½æ•°ç»“æŸæ¡ä»¶æ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆï¼šå½“nä¸º0æˆ–è€…ä¸º1çš„æ—¶å€™å°±åº”è¯¥ç»“æŸ  //3.å¯»æ‰¾å‡½æ•°çš„ç­‰å¼æˆ–è€…ç»™ä¸‹ä¸€å±‚è¿”å›çš„æ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆï¼šf(n) = f(n-1) + f(n-2)  public int fib(int N) {    if(N == 0 || N ==1){return N;}    return fib(N-1)+fib(N-2);  }  public static void main(String[] args) {    FibonacciSequence sequence = new FibonacciSequence();    int i = sequence.fib(3);    System.out.println(i);  }}

package com.cxy.linkedtable;/** * Reverse a singly linked list. * * Example: * * Input: 1->2->3->4->5->NULL * Output: 5->4->3->2->1->NULL * Follow up: * * A linked list can be reversed either iteratively or recursively. Could you implement both? * * æ¥æºï¼šåŠ›æ‰£ï¼ˆLeetCodeï¼‰ * é“¾æ¥ï¼šhttps://leetcode-cn.com/problems/reverse-linked-list * è‘—ä½œæƒå½’é¢†æ‰£ç½‘ç»œæ‰€æœ‰ã€‚å•†ä¸šè½¬è½½è¯·è”ç³»å®˜æ–¹æˆæƒï¼Œéå•†ä¸šè½¬è½½è¯·æ³¨æ˜å‡ºå¤„ã€‚ */public class ReverseSLList {  public ListNode reverseList(ListNode head) {    //é‡‡ç”¨é€’å½’è°ƒç”¨çš„æ–¹å¼è¿›è¡Œåè½¬ï¼Œä¸è¦åœ¨ä¹å†…éƒ¨çš„ç»†èŠ‚ï¼Œå…³æ³¨å¦‚ä¸‹å‡ ç‚¹    //    1.é€’å½’çš„ç»ˆæ­¢æ¡ä»¶ï¼šäº¤æ¢ä¸¤ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå¦‚æœåªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹æˆ–è€…æ˜¯æ²¡æœ‰èŠ‚ç‚¹å°±å¯ä»¥åœæ­¢äº†ã€‚    //    2.æœ¬çº§é€’å½’éœ€è¦ç»™ä¸‹çº§é€’å½’ä¼ é€’ä»€ä¹ˆï¼šç»™ä¸‹çº§ä¼ é€’çš„å°±æ˜¯å½“å‰ç»“ç‚¹çš„ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹    //    3.æœ¬æ¬¡é€’å½’åšä»€ä¹ˆï¼š æœ¬æ¬¡é€’å½’éœ€è¦äº¤æ¢ä¸¤ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹ã€‚    if(head == null || head.next == null){      return head;    }    //ç§»åŠ¨æŒ‡é’ˆæŒ‡å‘    ListNode res = reverseList(head.next);    head.next.next = head;    head.next = null;    return res;  }  public static void main(String[] args) {    ReverseSLList slList = new ReverseSLList();    ListNode l1 = new ListNode(1);    l1.next = new ListNode(2);    l1.next.next = new ListNode(3);    ListNode node = slList.reverseList(l1);    System.out.println(node.toString());  }}

public class longestCommonPrefix {  /**   * @param   * @return   */  public String longestCommonPrefix(String [] strs) {    //1.æ‹¿åˆ°æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„ä¸­çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œä¿å­˜ä¸‹æ¥    //2.å¾—åˆ°å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¸­æœ€å°çš„ä¸€ä¸ªé•¿åº¦ï¼Œéå†æ­¤é•¿åº¦ä¸‹çš„å…¶ä½™å­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„ä¸€ä¸ªå‰né¡¹çš„å€¼æ˜¯å¦ç›¸ç­‰ï¼Œç›¸ç­‰å°±è¿”å›ç›¸ç­‰çš„å…·ä½“çš„å­—ç¬¦ï¼Œå¦åˆ™è¿”å› ""    if(strs.length == 0 || strs == null){return "";}    String prefix = strs[0];    int minLen = prefix.length();    //æ‰¾åˆ°æœ€å°çš„ä¸€ä¸ªé•¿åº¦ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªï¼Œæœ€é•¿å‰ ç¼€å–å†³äºçŸ­è¾¹    for(int i=1; i<strs.length; i++){      //éå†æ±‚æœ€å°çš„é•¿åº¦      if(strs[i].length() < minLen) minLen = strs[i].length();    }    //è¿›è¡Œäºåé¢çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²è¿›è¡Œæ¯”è¾ƒï¼Œæ¯”è¾ƒå¾—åˆ°æœ€é•¿çš„ä¸€ä¸ªä¸²è¿›è¡Œè¾“å‡º    StringBuilder res = new StringBuilder();    for(int j=0; j< minLen; j++){      char ch = strs[0].charAt(j);      for(int k=1; k<strs.length ;k++){        if(ch != strs[k].charAt(j)){          return res.toString();        }      }      res.append(ch);    }    return res.toString();  }  public static void main(String[] args) {    System.out.println(new longestCommonPrefix().longestCommonPrefix(new String[]{"flower","flow","flight"}));  }}

public class RomanToInt {  public int romanToInt(String s) {    int sum = 0;    //å–åˆ°ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªçš„å€¼    int preNum = getValue(s.charAt(0));    for(int i= 1;i<s.length();i++){      int num = getValue(s.charAt(i));      if(preNum < num){        sum -= preNum;      }else {        sum += preNum;      }      preNum = num;    }    sum += preNum;    return sum;  }  public int getValue(char ch){    switch (ch) {      case 'I':        return 1;      case 'V':        return 5;      case 'X':        return 10;      case 'L':        return 50;      case 'C':        return 100;      case 'D':        return 500;      case 'M':        return 1000;      default:return 0;    }  }  public static void main(String[] args) {    System.out.println(new RomanToInt().romanToInt("IV"));  }}

/** * Definition for singly-linked list. * public class ListNode { *     int val; *     ListNode next; *     ListNode(int x) { val = x; } * } */  public ListNode swapPairs(ListNode head) {      if(head == null || head.next == null){return head;}      ListNode next = head.next;      head.next = swapPairs(next.next);      next.next = head;      return next;  }

0: l1.val;      int val2 = l2==null ? 0: l2.val;      int sum = val1 + val2 + addOne;      head.next = new ListNode(sum%10);      head = head.next;      //åˆ¤ null      //è¿›ä½      addOne = sum / 10;      if(l1 != null) l1 = l1.next;      if(l2 != null) l2 = l2.next;      System.out.println("---");    }    return dummy.next;  }  //æ‰“å°æ–¹æ³•  public String print(ListNode test){    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();    while (test.next != null){      sb.append(test.val +"-->");      test = test.next;    }    return sb.toString();  }  //å†…éƒ¨ç±»  public static class ListNode{    int val;    ListNode next;    public ListNode(int val){      this.val = val;    }  }  //æµ‹è¯•ç”¨ä¾‹l1:(2 -> 4 -> 3) + l2:(5 -> 6 -> 4)  public static void main(String[] args){    ListNode l1 = new ListNode(2);    l1.next = new ListNode(4);    l1.next.next = new ListNode(3);    ListNode l2 = new ListNode(5);    l1.next = new ListNode(6);    l1.next.next = new ListNode(4);    ListNode node = new AddTwoNumbers().addTwoNumbers(l1, l2);    System.out.println(node);    String s = new AddTwoNumbers().print(node);    System.out.println(s);  }}

package com.cxy.linkedtable;import javax.swing.*;public class MergTwoLTable {  public ListNode mergeTwoLists(ListNode l1,ListNode l2){    //åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªå“‘ç»“ç‚¹()    ListNode dummp = new ListNode(-1);    ListNode curr = dummp;    if(l1 == null){return l2;}    if(l2 == null){return l1;}    while(l1 != null && l2 != null){      if(l1.val < l2.val){        curr.next = new ListNode(l1.val);        //ç§»åŠ¨l1,æŒ‡å‘ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹        l1 = l1.next;      }else {        curr.next = new ListNode(l2.val);        l2 = l2.next;      }      //ç§»åŠ¨å½“å‰æŒ‡é’ˆåˆ°ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹      curr = curr.next;    }    if(l1 == null){curr.next = l2;}    if(l2 == null){curr.next = l1;}    return dummp.next;  }  public static void main(String[] args) {    MergTwoLTable lTable = new MergTwoLTable();    ListNode l1 = new ListNode(1);    l1.next = new ListNode(2);    l1.next.next = new ListNode(4);    ListNode l2 = new ListNode(1);    l2.next = new ListNode(3);    l2.next.next = new ListNode(4);    ListNode node = lTable.mergeTwoLists(l1, l2);    System.out.println(node.toString());  }}

package com.cxy.array;public class MaxArea {  public static int maxArea() {    int[] height = new int[]{1,8,6,2,5,4,8,3,7};    int res = 0;    for(int i=0; i<height.length; i++){      int first = height[i];      for(int j=i+1; j<height.length; j++){        //æ±‚å‡ºå¯¹åº”çš„è·ç¦»        int width = j-i;        //ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ çš„é«˜åº¦        int next = height[j];        //æ±‚å‡ºæœ€å°é«˜åº¦        int minHeight = Math.min(first,next);         //æ¯æ¬¡å¾ªç¯å°†æœ€å¤§çš„å€¼è¦†ç›–æ‰å‰é¢çš„å€¼        res = Math.max(minHeight*width,res);      }    }     //è¿”å›å€¼    return res;  }  //æµ‹è¯•ä»£ç   public static void main(String[] args) {    int i = MaxArea.maxArea();    System.out.println(i);  }}

package com.cxy.array;/** * åŒæŒ‡é’ˆæ³•å®ç°è£…æœ€å¤šæ°´çš„ä½“ç§¯ * ç»™ä½  n ä¸ªéè´Ÿæ•´æ•° a1ï¼Œa2ï¼Œ...ï¼Œanï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªæ•°ä»£è¡¨åæ ‡ä¸­çš„ä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹ (i, ai) ã€‚åœ¨åæ ‡å†…ç”» n æ¡å‚ç›´çº¿ï¼Œå‚ç›´çº¿ i çš„ä¸¤ä¸ªç«¯ç‚¹åˆ†åˆ«ä¸º *  (i, ai) å’Œ (i, 0)ã€‚æ‰¾å‡ºå…¶ä¸­çš„ä¸¤æ¡çº¿ï¼Œä½¿å¾—å®ƒä»¬ä¸ x è½´å…±åŒæ„æˆçš„å®¹å™¨å¯ä»¥å®¹çº³æœ€å¤šçš„æ°´ã€‚ * è¯´æ˜ï¼šä½ ä¸èƒ½å€¾æ–œå®¹å™¨ï¼Œä¸” n çš„å€¼è‡³å°‘ä¸º 2ã€‚ * * æ¥æºï¼šåŠ›æ‰£ï¼ˆLeetCodeï¼‰ * é“¾æ¥ï¼šhttps://leetcode-cn.com/problems/container-with-most-water * è‘—ä½œæƒå½’é¢†æ‰£ç½‘ç»œæ‰€æœ‰ã€‚å•†ä¸šè½¬è½½è¯·è”ç³»å®˜æ–¹æˆæƒï¼Œéå•†ä¸šè½¬è½½è¯·æ³¨æ˜å‡ºå¤„ã€‚ */public class MaxArea2 {  public static int maxArea() {    int[] height = new int[]{1,8,6,2,5,4,8,3,7};    //æŒ‡å‘æœ€å³è¾¹çš„æŒ‡é’ˆ   å’Œ     ç»“æœ    int j = height.length-1,res = 0;    for(int i=0;i<height.length;){      if(i == j){        break;      }      //æ±‚å‡ºä¸¤è¾¹ç¡å¾—é•¿åº¦æ›´å°ï¼Œè°å°è°å°±ç§»åŠ¨æŒ‡é’ˆ      int minH = Math.min(height[i],height[j]);      //å°†ç»“æœä¸ä¸Šä¸€æ¬¡å¾ªç¯å‡ºæ¥çš„ç»“æœè¿›è¡Œæ¯”è¾ƒï¼Œé€‰å‡ºæœ€å¤§çš„ä¸€ä¸ª      res = Math.max(res,minH*(j-i));      System.out.println("è®¡ç®—ç»“æœä¸ºï¼š"+res+"  å½“ç»™çš„jå€¼ï¼š"+j+"å½“å‰çš„æœ€å°é«˜åº¦ä¸ºï¼š"+minH+" ä¸­é—´çš„é•¿åº¦ä¸º"+(j-i));      if(height[i]<height[j]){        i++;      }else {        j--;      }    }    return res;  }  public static void main(String[] args) {    int i = MaxArea2.maxArea();    System.out.println(i);  }}

public int removeDuplicates(int[] nums) {    if(nums.length == 0){      return 0;    }    //å³æŒ‡é’ˆ    int j = 1;    //å·¦æŒ‡é’ˆ    int i = 0;    while (j < nums.length){      //å¦‚æœä¸ç›¸ç­‰ï¼Œå°±å°†jé‚£ä¸ªä½ç½®çš„å…ƒç´ è¦†ç›–æ‰i+1ä¸Šçš„å…ƒç´       if(nums[j] != nums[i]){        nums[i+1] = nums[j];        //æŒ‡é’ˆå³æŒ‡é’ˆå³ç§»        i++;      }      //å·¦æŒ‡é’ˆå³ç§»      j++;    }    return i+1;  }

package com.cxy.stack;import java.util.Stack;/** * ç»™å®š n ä¸ªéè´Ÿæ•´æ•°è¡¨ç¤ºæ¯ä¸ªå®½åº¦ä¸º 1 çš„æŸ±å­çš„é«˜åº¦å›¾ï¼Œè®¡ç®—æŒ‰æ­¤æ’åˆ—çš„æŸ±å­ï¼Œä¸‹é›¨ä¹‹åèƒ½æ¥å¤šå°‘é›¨æ°´ã€‚ * è¾“å…¥: [0,1,0,2,1,0,1,3,2,1,2,1] * è¾“å‡º: 6 */public class Trap {  public int trap(int[] height) {    //åˆ›å»ºæ ˆç”¨äºä¿å­˜ç»™å®šçš„æ•°ç»„çš„ä¸‹æ ‡å€¼    Stack<Integer> stack = new Stack<>();    //å­˜å‚¨è¿”å›ç»“æœå’Œè¿”å›å€¼    int i = 0,res=0;    //éå†æ•´ä¸ªæ•°ç»„    while(i<height.length){      //å†…å±‚å¾ªç¯ç›®çš„æ˜¯æ‰¾åˆ°å¤šä¸ªå€¼ä¹‹é—´åˆ°åº•æœ‰å¤šé•¿      //å¦‚æœå½“å‰å…ƒç´ çš„é«˜åº¦å¤§äºå‰é¢ä¸€ä¸ªï¼Œå°±è¦è¿›è¡Œè®¡ç®—å­˜å‚¨çš„æ°´æœ‰å¤šå°‘      //åˆ¤æ–­çš„æ¡ä»¶æ˜¯æ ˆä¸ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”å½“å‰å…ƒç´ çš„é«˜åº¦è¦å¤§äºå‰ä¸€ä¸ªï¼ˆæŸ¥æ‰¾å·¦è¾¹ç•Œï¼‰      while(!stack.isEmpty() && height[i]>height[stack.peek()]){        //å–å‡ºå½“å‰å…ƒç´ çš„é«˜åº¦        int currentHeight = height[i];        //ä¸­é—´å‡¹é™·çš„ç´¢å¼•        int preIndex = stack.pop();        if(stack.isEmpty())break;        //æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸­é—´å‡¹é™·å¤„çš„é«˜åº¦        int centerHeight = height[preIndex];        //ä¸­é—´å‡¹é™·å¤„çš„å‰ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ çš„é«˜åº¦        int preHeight = height[stack.peek()];        //çœŸæ­£èƒ½å¤Ÿè£…æ°´çš„é«˜åº¦=å·¦å³ä¸¤è¾¹é«˜åº¦çš„æœ€å°å€¼ - ä¸­é—´å‡¹é™·çš„é«˜åº¦        int minHeight = Math.min(currentHeight,preHeight) - centerHeight;        //----------------------ä¸Šé¢è·å–å‡¹é™·çš„é«˜åº¦--------------------------        //----------------------ä¸‹é¢è·å–å‡¹é™·çš„å®½åº¦--------------------------        int width = i-stack.peek()-1;        res += width*minHeight;        //å–å‡ºå½“å‰å…ƒç´ çš„å‰ä¸€ä¸ªçš„å‰      }      //æœ€åè¦å°†ç´¢å¼•å€¼+1è¿›å…¥ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªå¾ªç¯éå†      stack.push(i++);    }    return res;  }}

å…¶å®è¿˜æœ‰å…¶ä»–è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚åŒæŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªä»å·¦å¾€å³å¯»æ‰¾æœ€é«˜çš„ä½ç½®ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªä»å³å¾€å·¦æ‰¾æœ€é«˜ï¼›æš´åŠ›å¾ªç¯æ±‚è§£ï¼ŒåŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’ï¼ˆè¿™ä¸ªæˆ‘ä¸å¤ªä¼šï¼‰

class MinStack {    private List<Integer> list;    /** initialize your data structure here. */    public MinStack() {      //å¯¹è±¡æ„é€ çš„æ—¶å€™æ‰è¿›è¡Œåˆå§‹åŒ–      list = new ArrayList<Integer>();    }    public void push(int x) {      //å°†xå…¥åˆ°listçš„æœ«å°¾ï¼Œä¸€ä¼šå„¿ç›´æ¥è·å–æœ«å°¾æ•°å­—å°±èƒ½å¾—åˆ°æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´       list.add(x);    }    public void pop() {      //å‡ºæ ˆï¼Œåˆ é™¤æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´       list.remove(list.size()-1);    }    public int top() {      //æŸ¥çœ‹æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´       return list.get(list.size()-1);    }      //ä¸»è¦æ˜¯è¿™é‡Œä¸æ»¡è¶³æˆ‘ä»¬çš„éœ€æ±‚    public int getMin() {      //ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªä½œä¸ºæœ€å°çš„      int min = list.get(0);      for(int i : list){        //å¦‚æœæœ‰æ¯”ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªè¿˜å°çš„ï¼Œmin çš„å€¼å°±æ›´æ”¹ä¸ºå½“å‰å¾ªç¯å‡ºæ¥çš„å€¼        if(i<min){          min = i;        }      }      return min;    }}

package com.cxy.stack;import java.util.ArrayDeque;import java.util.Deque;/** * è®¾è®¡ä¸€ä¸ªæ”¯æŒ push ï¼Œpop ï¼Œtop æ“ä½œï¼Œå¹¶èƒ½åœ¨å¸¸æ•°æ—¶é—´å†…æ£€ç´¢åˆ°æœ€å°å…ƒç´ çš„æ ˆã€‚ * * push(x) â€”â€” å°†å…ƒç´  x æ¨å…¥æ ˆä¸­ã€‚ * pop() â€”â€” åˆ é™¤æ ˆé¡¶çš„å…ƒç´ ã€‚ * top() â€”â€” è·å–æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ ã€‚ * getMin() â€”â€” æ£€ç´¢æ ˆä¸­çš„æœ€å°å…ƒç´ ã€‚ * * MinStack minStack = new MinStack(); * minStack.push(-2); * minStack.push(0); * minStack.push(-3); * minStack.getMin();   --> è¿”å› -3. * minStack.pop(); * minStack.top();      --> è¿”å› 0. * minStack.getMin();   --> è¿”å› -2. * æ€æƒ³ï¼šæ¯ä¸ªæ•°å­—å…¥æœ€å°æ ˆçš„æ—¶å€™å…ˆè·Ÿæ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ è¿›è¡Œæ¯”è¾ƒï¼Œå¦‚æœæ¯”æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ éƒ½å°ï¼Œå…¥æ•°å­—æ ˆçš„åŒæ—¶è¦å…¥æœ€å°æ ˆ */public class MinStack {  /** initialize your data structure here. */  //æ•°å­—æ ˆ  private Deque<Integer> numStack;  //æœ€å°æ ˆ  private Deque<Integer> minStack;  public MinStack() {    //åœ¨è°ƒç”¨æ„é€ å‡½æ•°çš„æ—¶å€™æ‰è¿›è¡Œå¯¹è±¡çš„åˆå§‹åŒ–,å¼€è¾Ÿå†…å­˜ç©ºé—´    numStack = new ArrayDeque<>();    minStack = new ArrayDeque<>();  }  public void push(int x) {    //æ¯ä¸ªæ•°å­—å…¥æœ€å°æ ˆçš„æ—¶å€™å…ˆè·Ÿæ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ è¿›è¡Œæ¯”è¾ƒï¼Œå¦‚æœæ¯”æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ éƒ½å°ï¼Œå…¥æ•°å­—æ ˆçš„åŒæ—¶è¦å…¥æœ€å°æ ˆ    numStack.push(x);    if(minStack.size() ==0 || minStack.peek()>=x){      minStack.push(x);    }  }  public void pop() {    //æŸ¥çœ‹æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´     //å¼¹å‡ºæ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ ,numStackå‡ºæ ˆçš„å…ƒç´ minStackæ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ ä¸€è‡´æ—¶ï¼ŒminStackæ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ ä¹Ÿè¦å‡ºæ ˆ    int numPop = numStack.pop();    if(numPop == minStack.peek()){      minStack.pop();    }  }  public int top() {   return numStack.peek();  }  public int getMin() {    return minStack.peek();  }}

class Solution {    public boolean isValid( String s) {    HashMap<Character,Character> map = new HashMap<>();    //å°†å¯¹åº”çš„ç¬¦å·æ”¾å…¥mapä¸­ï¼Œå‰é¢ä½œä¸ºé”®ï¼Œåé¢ä½œä¸ºå€¼    //æ³¨æ„è¿™é‡Œé”®å€¼å¯¹é¡ºåºä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆè¦è¿™æ ·    map.put(')','(');    map.put('}','{');    map.put(']','[');    Deque<Character> stack = new ArrayDeque<>();//    Stack<Character> stack = new Stack<>();    if(s.length()==0 || s==null){return true;}    for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++){      if(s.charAt(i) == '[' || s.charAt(i) == '{' || s.charAt(i) == '('){        stack.push(s.charAt(i));      }else if(map.get(s.charAt(i)) == stack.peek()){        //å¦‚æœä¸‹æ¬¡å¾ªç¯çš„å€¼ä½œä¸ºé”®ï¼Œå¾—åˆ°çš„å€¼è·Ÿæ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ ç›¸åŒï¼Œå°±è®©æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ å‡ºæ ˆ        System.out.println("æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ ä¸ºï¼š"+stack.peek());        stack.pop();      }else{        return false;      }    }    return stack.isEmpty();  }}

     }else if(ch !=')'){        System.out.println("å…¥æ“ä½œæ•°æ ˆï¼š"+ch);        number.push(Double.parseDouble(Character.toString(ch)));      }else if(ch ==')'){        //é‡åˆ°å³æ‹¬å·ï¼Œå‡ºæ“ä½œç¬¦æ ˆ,å¹¶æ‰§è¡Œç›¸åº”çš„numberå‡ºæ ˆ        System.out.println("é‡åˆ°å³æ‹¬å·");        tempOperator = opertor.pop();        //å†å‡ºä¸€æ¬¡æ“ä½œç¬¦æ ˆå°†ï¼ˆæ‹¬å·å»æ‰        String leftKuo = opertor.pop();        System.out.println("é‡åˆ°å³æ‹¬å·å‡ºæ ˆçš„å­—ç¬¦ï¼š"+tempOperator);        System.out.println("å°†å·¦æ‹¬å·å»ç”µ"+leftKuo);        //å‡ºç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªnumber//        System.out.println("æ“ä½œæ•°å³è¾¹çš„æ•°ï¼š"+firstNumber);        if(tempOperator.equals("+")){          double firstNumber = number.pop();          double lastNumber = number.pop();
